title: I hate the new Irelia.
body: Like...don't take my Irelia away. I started play the current Irelia because of how cool she looks and now she is going away. Stop it. She was fine visually.

replies.body: New Irelia's head is too big imo.

you should be happy: her clunky hair seem to stay....


(otherwise they did kit wise a great job)
not a fan of the new splash arts, ingame models look great but splashes dont capture the old irelia. order of the lotus kept old elements but face looks really off and doesnt fit at all imo
